titleStmt.title: The Happy slave a novel in three parts compleat / translated from the French by a person of quality.
titleStmt.author: Brémond, Gabriel de.
Person of quality.

notesStmt.note: Erroneously attributed to G. Brémond--NUC pre-1956 imprints, v. 74, p. 239.
Imperfect: print show-through with loss of print.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
